actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to treat Federal retirement system income the same as social security income to the extent that such retirement income does not exceed the sum of old-age benefits which may be received under title II of the Social Security Act and amounts which may be earned without reducing such benefits.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to exclude Federal retirement benefits from the income tax to the same extent the beneficiaries would have been entitled to exclude benefits and income under the Social Security Act.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to treat Federal retirement system income the same as social security income to the extent that such retirement income does not exceed the sum of old-age benefits which may be received under title II of the Social Security Act and amounts which may be earned without reducing such benefits.
